archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection includes the 1870 timber account book of James Clark.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Timber Account Book must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Timber Account Book, Ms2011-108, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: In September 2011, the Timber Account Book was found among a collection of unrelated materials.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Timber Account Book was completed in November 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of one partially filled account book. Starting from February 26, 1870, one "James Clark" used the book to track the purchases of timber.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
